description:
"I like to fight. I like to do MMA."
We weren't really sure what Colin was talking about. This assumption was that the last 'M' and 'A' stood for 'Marial Arts.'"
"It's mixed martial arts," he explained. "It incorporated all types of fighting. It's basically street fighting with a brain."
He does it competitively and says that he's had his share of black eyes.
His future plans: to become a fire fighter.
"Saving lives," he said. "And kicking down doors!"
title: Colin
